Transcription (src/transcription)

This module handles the transcription of audio and video input using AssemblyAI, enabling multimodal emotion classification.

Transcription CLI

Command-line tool for sending audio files to AssemblyAI and retrieving transcribed text.

Example:

python src/transcription/CLI_transcribe.py \
    --input data/mp3/Sondy_FIXED2.mp3 \
    --language pl

Transcription Engine

Translate Polish sentences to English using a pretrained translation model.

src.transcription.transcribe.get_transcript_df(transcript_id: str) → pandas.DataFrame[source]

Retrieve sentence-level transcript and classify each sentence’s emotion.

Parameters:

transcript_id – ID of the completed transcription job.

Returns:

  • “Start Time”: HH:MM:SS,mmm

  • ”End Time”: HH:MM:SS,mmm

  • ”Sentence”: Transcribed text

  • ”Emotion”: Predicted emotion label

Return type:

DataFrame with columns

Raises:

None—on error, returns an empty DataFrame. –

src.transcription.transcribe.request_transcription(upload_url: str) → str[source]

Submit a transcription job to AssemblyAI and wait until it completes.

This function polls the AssemblyAI API until the transcription status is ‘completed’ or ‘error’, and returns the transcript ID on success.

Parameters:

upload_url – URL of the uploaded audio file to be transcribed.

Returns:

Transcript ID used to fetch the final transcript data.

Raises:

Exception – If transcription fails or a request error occurs.

Core functions: - Upload to AssemblyAI - Monitor job status - Translate (if required) - Return cleaned text for classification

AssemblyAI API Key

Make sure .env includes:

ASSEMBLYAI_API_KEY=your_key_here
